doc.title: Destination Unknown
doc.plot: A character driven, international suspense thriller, the story deals with a cover-up murder committed by the a federal organization against a research scientist who discovers the healing properties of a Caribbean medicinal plant. The "big business" of the multi-billion dollar drug industry is too powerful to let this discovery effect the bottom line of the drug profits. While mercenaries are pursuing the scientist and a top news reporter, the global chase is on to discover the cause of the murder and to protect those now fearing for their own lives.
